item.description:
I would like to nail down a few items before I talk about the meetup:

  • Note the new time: 8:30pm

Sorry...I lied. It was just one item. Now that the air is clear - ahem! Let's party! Here's what is in store for you:

  • 8:30 - Toss the disc around, meet folks, be merry
  • 8:45 - Overview of the rules, safety, etc...then divide into teams
  • 8:50/9:00 - Play!!!!!!
  • 10:30 - Conclude the meetup with snacks and socialitizingness

Here's what we [kindly] ask of you (works great as a checklist):

  • Please RSVP so we can accommodate accordingly
  • Please bring a light colored shirt
  • Please bring water
  • Please arrive on-time if you can
  • If you are a regular, please consider bringing one buck for the Frisbee Fund

As usual, we will supply the frisbees, cones, lanyards, first aid supplies (hopefully will never be used) and our pretty smiles. As we periodically mention, all these supplies are paid out-of-pocket by your loving Frisbee organizers and everyone has been so generous with their donations to-date. Thank you and let's keep the dream alive!

Joe
Organizer
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be playing on the football field with light-up frisbees...you can't miss us. (Or Kelli Cooper falling on her butt.)
item.why: 3 reasons: [1] We welcome everyone regardless of his/her skill level (we esp love folks who have never played before) [2] Frisbee is tizotally fun, especially at night [3] Kelli Cooper will be whining about the light-up lanyards.
item.name: Fun Times with Frisbee High
